class.name: PIXI.Point

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: position of the point on the x axis

parameters.name: y
parameters.help: position of the point on the y axis

class.help: The Point object represents a location in a two-dimensional coordinate system, where x represents the horizontal axis and y represents the vertical axis.

public.name: clone
public.help: Creates a clone of this point

public.name: set
public.help: Sets the point to a new x and y position.\nIf y is omitted, both x and y will be set to x.

parameters.name: [x=0]
parameters.help: position of the point on the x axis

parameters.name: [y=0]
parameters.help: position of the point on the y axis
